ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, as a result of alcohol use: How often were you unable to remember a few minutes of what happened?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 times; 3= 3 times; 4= 4 or more times

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, as a result of alcohol use: How often did you have to be reminded about things you had previously forgotten due to alcohol use?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 times; 3= 3 times; 4= 4 or more times

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, as a result of alcohol use: How often did you have fuzzy memories of events that occurred while you were drinking?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 times; 3= 3 times; 4= 4 or more times

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, as a result of alcohol use: How often were you able to remember a small part of the day only after being reminded?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 times; 3= 3 times; 4= 4 or more times

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, as a result of alcohol use: How often did you wake up with no idea where you had been or what you had done after a certain point?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 times; 3= 3 times; 4= 4 or more times

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, as a result of alcohol use: How often were you unable to remember hours at a time?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 times; 3= 3 times; 4= 4 or more times

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, as a result of alcohol use: While still in a drinking situation, how often did you suddenly realize that you have no memory of how you got to be where you are?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 times; 3= 3 times; 4= 4 or more times

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, as a result of alcohol use: How often were you unable to remember what happened the night before because you had been drinking?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 times; 3= 3 times; 4= 4 or more times

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often have you: Had fuzzy memories of events that occurred while you were drinking?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 to 3 times; 3= Weekly; 4= 2 times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often have you: Been unable to remember things that happened while you were drinking?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 to 3 times; 3= Weekly; 4= 2 times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often have you: Had memories that became clear only when someone/something gave you cues or reminded you later?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 to 3 times; 3= Weekly; 4= 2 times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often have you: Been unable to remember things that happened while you were drinking until someone reminded you about it the next day?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 to 3 times; 3= Weekly; 4= 2 times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often have you: Been told about things you said/did that you do not remember at all, even when people tried to remind you?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 to 3 times; 3= Weekly; 4= 2 times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often have you: Been unable to remember an hour or more of a drinking event?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 to 3 times; 3= Weekly; 4= 2 times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often have you: Wondered or suspected that things happened while you were drinking that you do not remember?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 to 3 times; 3= Weekly; 4= 2 times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often have you: Been unable to remember what happened the night before because you had been drinking (AUDIT)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 to 3 times; 3= Weekly; 4= 2 times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often have you: Not been able to remember large stretches of time while drinking heavily (BYAACQ)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 to 3 times; 3= Weekly; 4= 2 times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often have you: Suddenly found yourself in a place you do not remember getting to (RAPI)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1 time; 2= 2 to 3 times; 3= Weekly; 4= 2 times a week or more
